SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id`, `i`.`CreatedBy`, `i`.`CreatedDate`, `i`.`DeletedBy`, `i`.`DeletedDate`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted`, `i`.`ModifiedBy`, `i`.`ModifiedDate`, `c0`.`Id`, `c0`.`CreatedBy`, `c0`.`CreatedDate`, `c0`.`DeletedBy`, `c0`.`DeletedDate`, `c0`.`ImageId`, `c0`.`IsDeleted`, `c0`.`ModifiedBy`, `c0`.`ModifiedDate`, `c0`.`Name`, `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c0`.`Slug`
FROM `Categories` AS `c`
LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `c`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `c`.`Id` = `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`
WHERE NOT (`c`.`IsDeleted`)
ORDER BY `c`.`Id`, `i`.`Id`

FROM `Categories` AS `c`
LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `c`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `c`.`Id` = `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`
WHERE NOT (`c`.`IsDeleted`)
ORDER BY `c`.`Id`, `i`.`Id`

SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id`, `c0`.`Id`, `c0`.`CreatedBy`, `c0`.`CreatedDate`, `c0`.`DeletedBy`, `c0`.`DeletedDate`, `c0`.`ImageId`, `c0`.`IsDeleted`, `c0`.`ModifiedBy`, `c0`.`ModifiedDate`, `c0`.`Name`, `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c0`.`Slug`, `i`.`CreatedBy`, `i`.`CreatedDate`, `i`.`DeletedBy`, `i`.`DeletedDate`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted`, `i`.`ModifiedBy`, `i`.`ModifiedDate`
FROM `Categories` AS `c`
LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `c`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `c`.`Id` = `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`
WHERE `c`.`ParentCategoryId` IS NULL
ORDER BY `c`.`Id`, `i`.`Id`

SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id`, `i`.`CreatedBy`, `i`.`CreatedDate`, `i`.`DeletedBy`, `i`.`DeletedDate`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted`, `i`.`ModifiedBy`, `i`.`ModifiedDate`, `c0`.`Id`, `c0`.`CreatedBy`, `c0`.`CreatedDate`, `c0`.`DeletedBy`, `c0`.`DeletedDate`, `c0`.`ImageId`, `c0`.`IsDeleted`, `c0`.`ModifiedBy`, `c0`.`ModifiedDate`, `c0`.`Name`, `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c0`.`Slug`
FROM `Categories` AS `c`
LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `c`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `c`.`Id` = `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`
WHERE NOT (`c`.`IsDeleted`)
ORDER BY `c`.`Id`, `i`.`Id`

SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`, `i`.`Id`, `i`.`CreatedBy`, `i`.`CreatedDate`, `i`.`DeletedBy`, `i`.`DeletedDate`, `i`.`FileName`, `i`.`FileType`, `i`.`IsDeleted`, `i`.`ModifiedBy`, `i`.`ModifiedDate`, `c0`.`Id`, `c0`.`CreatedBy`, `c0`.`CreatedDate`, `c0`.`DeletedBy`, `c0`.`DeletedDate`, `c0`.`ImageId`, `c0`.`IsDeleted`, `c0`.`ModifiedBy`, `c0`.`ModifiedDate`, `c0`.`Name`, `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c0`.`Slug`
FROM `Categories` AS `c`
LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `c`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `c`.`Id` = `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`
WHERE NOT (`c`.`IsDeleted`)
ORDER BY `c`.`Id`, `i`.`Id`

SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`, `c0`.`Id`, `c0`.`CreatedBy`, `c0`.`CreatedDate`, `c0`.`DeletedBy`, `c0`.`DeletedDate`, `c0`.`ImageId`, `c0`.`IsDeleted`, `c0`.`ModifiedBy`, `c0`.`ModifiedDate`, `c0`.`Name`, `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c0`.`Slug`
FROM `Categories` AS `c`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `c`.`ParentCategoryId` = `c0`.`Id`
WHERE NOT (`c`.`IsDeleted`)

SELECT `t`.`Id`, `t`.`CreatedBy`, `t`.`CreatedDate`, `t`.`DeletedBy`, `t`.`DeletedDate`, `t`.`ImageId`, `t`.`IsDeleted`, `t`.`ModifiedBy`, `t`.`ModifiedDate`, `t`.`Name`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId`, `t`.`Slug`, `c0`.`Id`, `c0`.`CreatedBy`, `c0`.`CreatedDate`, `c0`.`DeletedBy`, `c0`.`DeletedDate`, `c0`.`ImageId`, `c0`.`IsDeleted`, `c0`.`ModifiedBy`, `c0`.`ModifiedDate`, `c0`.`Name`, `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c0`.`Slug`, `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`
FROM (
    SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`
    FROM `Categories` AS `c`
    WHERE `c`.`Id` = @__categoryId_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`

LEFT JOIN `Products` AS `p` ON `t`.`Id` = `p`.`CategoryId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `c0`.`Id`

SELECT `t`.`Id`, `t`.`CreatedBy`, `t`.`CreatedDate`, `t`.`DeletedBy`, `t`.`DeletedDate`, `t`.`ImageId`, `t`.`IsDeleted`, `t`.`ModifiedBy`, `t`.`ModifiedDate`, `t`.`Name`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId`, `t`.`Slug`, `c0`.`Id`, `c0`.`CreatedBy`, `c0`.`CreatedDate`, `c0`.`DeletedBy`, `c0`.`DeletedDate`, `c0`.`ImageId`, `c0`.`IsDeleted`, `c0`.`ModifiedBy`, `c0`.`ModifiedDate`, `c0`.`Name`, `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c0`.`Slug`, `p`.`Id`, `p`.`CategoryId`, `p`.`CreatedBy`, `p`.`CreatedDate`, `p`.`Date`, `p`.`DeletedBy`, `p`.`DeletedDate`, `p`.`Description`, `p`.`Details`, `p`.`DiscountRate`, `p`.`ImageId`, `p`.`InstallmentCount`, `p`.`IsDeleted`, `p`.`ModifiedBy`, `p`.`ModifiedDate`, `p`.`Name`, `p`.`Price`, `p`.`Slug`
FROM (
    SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`
    FROM `Categories` AS `c`
    WHERE `c`.`Id` = @__categoryId_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `t`.`Id` = `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`
LEFT JOIN `Products` AS `p` ON `t`.`Id` = `p`.`CategoryId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `c0`.`Id`

FROM (
    SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`

    LEFT JOIN `Images` AS `i` ON `p`.`ImageId` = `i`.`Id`

) AS `t`

    SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`

FROM (
    SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`
    FROM `Categories` AS `c`
    WHERE `c`.`Id` = @__categoryId_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `t`.`Id` = `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`

FROM (
    SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`
    FROM `Categories` AS `c`
    WHERE `c`.`Id` = @__categoryId_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `t`.`Id` = `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`

SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`, `c0`.`Id`, `c0`.`CreatedBy`, `c0`.`CreatedDate`, `c0`.`DeletedBy`, `c0`.`DeletedDate`, `c0`.`ImageId`, `c0`.`IsDeleted`, `c0`.`ModifiedBy`, `c0`.`ModifiedDate`, `c0`.`Name`, `c0`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c0`.`Slug`
FROM `Categories` AS `c`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `c`.`ParentCategoryId` = `c0`.`Id`
WHERE NOT (`c`.`IsDeleted`)

SELECT `t`.`Id`, `t`.`CreatedBy`, `t`.`CreatedDate`, `t`.`DeletedBy`, `t`.`DeletedDate`, `t`.`ImageId`, `t`.`IsDeleted`, `t`.`ModifiedBy`, `t`.`ModifiedDate`, `t`.`Name`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId`, `t`.`Slug`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`CreatedBy0`, `t`.`CreatedDate0`, `t`.`DeletedBy0`, `t`.`DeletedDate0`, `t`.`ImageId0`, `t`.`IsDeleted0`, `t`.`ModifiedBy0`, `t`.`ModifiedDate0`, `t`.`Name0`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId0`, `t`.`Slug0`, `c1`.`Id`, `c1`.`CreatedBy`, `c1`.`CreatedDate`, `c1`.`DeletedBy`, `c1`.`DeletedDate`, `c1`.`ImageId`, `c1`.`IsDeleted`, `c1`.`ModifiedBy`, `c1`.`ModifiedDate`, `c1`.`Name`, `c1`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c1`.`Slug`
FROM (
    SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`, `c0`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `c0`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `c0`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `c0`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `c0`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `c0`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c0`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `c0`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `c0`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c0`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c0`.`ParentCategoryId` AS `ParentCategoryId0`, `c0`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Categories` AS `c`
    LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `c`.`ParentCategoryId` = `c0`.`Id`
    WHERE `c`.`Slug` = @__slug_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c1` ON `t`.`Id` = `c1`.`ParentCategoryId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`

SELECT `t`.`Id`, `t`.`CreatedBy`, `t`.`CreatedDate`, `t`.`DeletedBy`, `t`.`DeletedDate`, `t`.`ImageId`, `t`.`IsDeleted`, `t`.`ModifiedBy`, `t`.`ModifiedDate`, `t`.`Name`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId`, `t`.`Slug`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`CreatedBy0`, `t`.`CreatedDate0`, `t`.`DeletedBy0`, `t`.`DeletedDate0`, `t`.`ImageId0`, `t`.`IsDeleted0`, `t`.`ModifiedBy0`, `t`.`ModifiedDate0`, `t`.`Name0`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId0`, `t`.`Slug0`, `c1`.`Id`, `c1`.`CreatedBy`, `c1`.`CreatedDate`, `c1`.`DeletedBy`, `c1`.`DeletedDate`, `c1`.`ImageId`, `c1`.`IsDeleted`, `c1`.`ModifiedBy`, `c1`.`ModifiedDate`, `c1`.`Name`, `c1`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c1`.`Slug`
FROM (
    SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`, `c0`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `c0`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `c0`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `c0`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `c0`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `c0`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c0`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `c0`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `c0`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c0`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c0`.`ParentCategoryId` AS `ParentCategoryId0`, `c0`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Categories` AS `c`
    LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `c`.`ParentCategoryId` = `c0`.`Id`
    WHERE `c`.`Slug` = @__slug_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c1` ON `t`.`Id` = `c1`.`ParentCategoryId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`

SELECT `t`.`Id`, `t`.`CreatedBy`, `t`.`CreatedDate`, `t`.`DeletedBy`, `t`.`DeletedDate`, `t`.`ImageId`, `t`.`IsDeleted`, `t`.`ModifiedBy`, `t`.`ModifiedDate`, `t`.`Name`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId`, `t`.`Slug`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`CreatedBy0`, `t`.`CreatedDate0`, `t`.`DeletedBy0`, `t`.`DeletedDate0`, `t`.`ImageId0`, `t`.`IsDeleted0`, `t`.`ModifiedBy0`, `t`.`ModifiedDate0`, `t`.`Name0`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId0`, `t`.`Slug0`, `c1`.`Id`, `c1`.`CreatedBy`, `c1`.`CreatedDate`, `c1`.`DeletedBy`, `c1`.`DeletedDate`, `c1`.`ImageId`, `c1`.`IsDeleted`, `c1`.`ModifiedBy`, `c1`.`ModifiedDate`, `c1`.`Name`, `c1`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c1`.`Slug`
FROM (
    SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`, `c0`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `c0`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `c0`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `c0`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `c0`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `c0`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c0`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `c0`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `c0`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c0`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c0`.`ParentCategoryId` AS `ParentCategoryId0`, `c0`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Categories` AS `c`
    LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `c`.`ParentCategoryId` = `c0`.`Id`
    WHERE `c`.`Slug` = @__slug_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c1` ON `t`.`Id` = `c1`.`ParentCategoryId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`

SELECT `t`.`Id`, `t`.`CreatedBy`, `t`.`CreatedDate`, `t`.`DeletedBy`, `t`.`DeletedDate`, `t`.`ImageId`, `t`.`IsDeleted`, `t`.`ModifiedBy`, `t`.`ModifiedDate`, `t`.`Name`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId`, `t`.`Slug`, `t`.`Id0`, `t`.`CreatedBy0`, `t`.`CreatedDate0`, `t`.`DeletedBy0`, `t`.`DeletedDate0`, `t`.`ImageId0`, `t`.`IsDeleted0`, `t`.`ModifiedBy0`, `t`.`ModifiedDate0`, `t`.`Name0`, `t`.`ParentCategoryId0`, `t`.`Slug0`, `c1`.`Id`, `c1`.`CreatedBy`, `c1`.`CreatedDate`, `c1`.`DeletedBy`, `c1`.`DeletedDate`, `c1`.`ImageId`, `c1`.`IsDeleted`, `c1`.`ModifiedBy`, `c1`.`ModifiedDate`, `c1`.`Name`, `c1`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c1`.`Slug`
FROM (
    SELECT `c`.`Id`, `c`.`CreatedBy`, `c`.`CreatedDate`, `c`.`DeletedBy`, `c`.`DeletedDate`, `c`.`ImageId`, `c`.`IsDeleted`, `c`.`ModifiedBy`, `c`.`ModifiedDate`, `c`.`Name`, `c`.`ParentCategoryId`, `c`.`Slug`, `c0`.`Id` AS `Id0`, `c0`.`CreatedBy` AS `CreatedBy0`, `c0`.`CreatedDate` AS `CreatedDate0`, `c0`.`DeletedBy` AS `DeletedBy0`, `c0`.`DeletedDate` AS `DeletedDate0`, `c0`.`ImageId` AS `ImageId0`, `c0`.`IsDeleted` AS `IsDeleted0`, `c0`.`ModifiedBy` AS `ModifiedBy0`, `c0`.`ModifiedDate` AS `ModifiedDate0`, `c0`.`Name` AS `Name0`, `c0`.`ParentCategoryId` AS `ParentCategoryId0`, `c0`.`Slug` AS `Slug0`
    FROM `Categories` AS `c`
    LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c0` ON `c`.`ParentCategoryId` = `c0`.`Id`
    WHERE (`c`.`Slug` = @__slug_0) AND NOT (`c`.`IsDeleted`)
    LIMIT 2
) AS `t`
LEFT JOIN `Categories` AS `c1` ON `t`.`Id` = `c1`.`ParentCategoryId`
ORDER BY `t`.`Id`, `t`.`Id0`
